resources.string: Chicken is a term which refers to a species of poultry. It is raised in many places for its meat and eggs

While lamb and mutton meat both come from sheep, lamb is typically less than one year old, while mutton is typically three years old. Learn about common cuts and cooking methods for both types of meat.
